abstract: AM comes from the Latin amare, “to love.” The Roman god of love was known by two different names, Cupid and Amor. Amiable means “friendly or good-natured,” and amigo is Spanish for “friend.”

words.explain: Amicable often describes relations between two groups, or especially two nations
Having or showing strong feelings of attraction or love
Charmed or fascinated; inflamed with love.
